text: wadhkr -ayha alnby- hin 'akhadhna min alnabiiyn aleahd almwkd btblygh alrsalt, wa'akhadhna almithaq mink wamin nuwh wa'iibrahim wamusaa waeisaa abn maryam (whm 'uwlu aleazm min alrusul ealaa almshhwr), wa'akhadhna minhum ehdana mwkdana btblygh alrisalat wa'ada' alamant, wa'ana yusaddiq bedhm bedana
